Scenarios: Technical assistance fees A non-resident company issued an invoice dated 26 Mar 2023 to a payer for technical assistance fees in respect of services rendered. The invoice  stated that the amount must be paid within 30 days. The payer received the invoice on 30 Apr 2023 and paid the non-resident on 19 May 2023.
Filing and payment due date: 15 May 2023  For GIRO payer, deduction takes place on 25 May 2023.

Scenarios: Royalty payment The agreement stated that royalties at 5% of sales shall accrue to the non-resident at the end of each quarter. In this instance,  the royalty period from Apr to Jun 2023 was accrued on 30 Jun 2023 (end of quarter), and the royalty payment was made to the non-resident on 15 Jul 2023.
Filing and payment due date: 15 Aug 2023  For GIRO payer, deduction takes place on 25 Aug 2023

Scenarios: Director’s fee The director’s fee of $50,000 for period 01 Jan 2022 to 31 Dec 2022, was voted and approved in the company's Annual General Meeting (AGM) on 2 Jul 2023. However, the fee was only paid to the director on 29 Sep 2023.
Filing and payment due date: 15 Sep 2023  For GIRO payer, deduction takes place on 25 Sep 2023.
